Security Assignment on a resource group over a given scope
API Version: 2021-08-01-preview.

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}expected effect of this assignment (Disable/Exempt/etc){{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="etag_nodejs">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Entity tag is used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="expireson_nodejs">

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Expiration date of this assignment as a full ISO date{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    <dd>{{% md %}}Kind of the resource{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The assignment metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">

<a href="#last_modified_by_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">last_<wbr>modified_<wbr>by</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The identity that last modified the resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="last_modified_by_type_python">
<a href="#last_modified_by_type_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">last_<wbr>modified_<wbr>by_<wbr>type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of identity that last modified the resource.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
